room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Our kids did the Kings treasure for their first escape and thoroughly enjoyed every bit of it! We moved into the competition rooms next!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This location is amazing. They have a very large room - the biggest I have ever seen! The puzzles and set design were perfect! the rooms are not tech heavy by any means but have a good mix and when there isn't any, the puzzles and theme are so well designed you don't even notice!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We were greeted warmly, and provided the 'rules' of the Prisoner Cells. The facility is beautiful! The details in the props and clues were amazing. We had a great time and can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My wife and I have done a number of escape rooms over the past few years. We did "The Cells" and had a great time. Lots of great puzzles and great ambiance. We are planning to return and do some of the other rooms there

room_title: Escape room "The Cells" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was by far the best escape room weâ€™ve been to in Marietta. The hosts were excellent and the rooms were great and very detailed. Will definitely be going back with friends.
